mean_cn: n. 周年纪念日；  adj. 周年的，（有关）周年纪念的
mean_en: a date that is an exact number of years after the date of an important or special event
sentence: He gave his wife a diamond ring on their tenth anniversary.
sentence_trans: 在结婚十周年之际，他送了老婆一枚钻戒。
word_etyma: anni=ann年 + vers转 + ary名词后缀 → 一年的转弯处一次 → anniversary周年纪念日
